name: And Then Night Came...
description:
A short arena shooter, time-attack game where the objective is to collect all the sweets and and survive!

Created from scratch over the 2021 May Day Weekend as a personal challenge.

If you have and RTX graphics card you'll also benefit from ray-traced lighting! If not - no worries, it'll still run on many Windows machines.

Uses a mouse and keyboard or Xbox controller.
